nodes.text: Lutris was a locale on the Expansion Region planet of Tynna. Shortly before the Clone Wars in 22 BBY, the Tynna Central Government Building, which was sited in Lutris near Lutris Lake, collapsed due to a stone mite infestation. The incident prompted Tynna's leader, Razelfiin, to secede from the Galactic Republic.
Lutris first appeared in HoloNet News Vol. 531 #53, an article on the HoloNet News website in 2002.
